audio_sound_get_pitch: This function can be used to get the get pitch of a given sound. The sound can either be one referenced from an index for an individual sound being played which has been stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions, or an actual sound asset from the Asset Browser.
The index of the sound to get the pitch of.
The above code will change the pitch of the audio played from the sound indexed as "snd_Explode" if its pitch is not equal to 1.
